input.sentences: i had to clean my work area today .
i took all the pictures and papers on my desk and taped them to the wall .
and now my wall is decorated .
output.sentences: Today I took time to clean.
The clutter was driving me crazy.
I decided to put up some pictures and tape them on my wall.
It was all coming along beautifully.
Now it gave it a home feel with these wall decorations.
